price: 120. Entonces el Demonio le susurró: «¡Adán!, ¿quieres que te muestre el árbol de la inmortalidad y de un reino infinito?».
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
